name: Hostage of Time
description:
FOR FULL EXPERIENCE DOWNLOAD (there are some issues with the WebGL video Player)

Hello guys! This is our submission for the Brackey's Game jam 2020.2!

So this game is like a future to the past game.. puzzle game I guess?

Game controls are in the game itself.

SPOILERS (this spoils the story)

You are a Cyborg from 2128 and the World is burning down, every thing goes broken and you don't want to live with that anymore. So to go back in time to fix everything you are the first human on earth that discovers time traveling. So you went back in year 2020, where it all begun...

Once here, you remember nothing, you don't know who you are or where you are. This should be a side effect of time traveling..

Cause of your strange behavior and your metal components in your body, you get a lot of intention from other people.. Since the day the government found out you just couldn't be from this time.

So they took you with them. 

When you wake up you're at strange place, and there are strange things happening to you.. maybe more side effects?

SPOILERS (this spoils the story)
